webApplications.title: Office days
webApplications.description: Since we work at our company in a remote environment and just sometimes someone visits the office, I developed a little web app to communicate our office days

webApplications.title: Family tree
webApplications.description: Based on the dTree library I built a family tree. In addition, I wrote a graph-to-list converter to switch between different family trees.

webApplications.title: Topic Tracker
webApplications.description: Create a topic do you want to work on, set the desired time. Dedicate your time to a task you created and see how much time you spent. Built with svelte.

webApplications.title: Maintenance buddy
webApplications.description: Last year I created an app called garage buddy to manage the maintenances of my vehicles. Garage buddy is a SPA that uses Google Firestore for authentication and persistence. The problem is that I want to have more control over the data and to write the domain logic in the backend instead in the SPA. Therefore I created this new project that uses Svelte as frontend, ASP.NET Core in the backend and Entity Framework Core as ORM to a PostgreSQL database. For security in the SPA and backend I rely on Auth0. The API of the backend isn't a REST API, I wanted to try a more CQRS like approach.

bicycle.title: Bike ride through germany
bicycle.description: I visited my sister in Ingolstadt with my bicycle. I drove 654 kilometers in 5 days. It was awesome!

handcraft.title: Building a couch
handcraft.description: We wanted to have a couch on our balcony to enjoy the sunset. Therefore we built a couch ;)

handcraft.title: Building a raised bed
handcraft.description: In summer 2019 my girlfriend and I moved to a new location. Although it was possible to use the garden we wanted to have the possibility to plant something near the kitchen. So I decided to construct and build a raised bed.

desktopApplications.title: OpenCV Augmented Reality
desktopApplications.description: An augmented reality application with a combination of C++, OpenGL, OpenCV and the ArUco library.

desktopApplications.title: Matlab Augmented Reality
desktopApplications.description: An augmented reality application with Matlab for the image processing module in university. Read the webcam image and try to detect the movie cover and play the trailer at this position.
